Rajya Sabha MP #SudhaMurthy has expressed her support for the three-language policy outlined in the National Education Policy (NEP), which promotes multilingual learning among students.

"I have always believed that one can learn multiple languages and I myself know 7-8 languages. So I enjoy learning and children can earn a lot."
